cast.name: 普姆帕特·伊安查芒 Poompat Iam-samang
帕兰妮·琳帕缇雅空 Pattranite Limpatiyakorn

director.name: 严永·库鲁昂孔 Yanyong Kuruaungkoul

this_title: เธอ เหงา เรา เต่า
introduction: After being betrayed by his colleague, Mix, a talented young architect starts working in a new company. Soon after, a Christmas outing is organized, but he cannot go because he has not yet completed a work. Then, he meets Bell, an intern who was doing an internship when no one was around. xxys9.com Mix came up with a fun idea, he organized a party for lonely people with a game: whoever invited the most people to the party wins!
foreign_title: เธอ เหงา เรา เต่า
